actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board of International Broadcasting Act of 1973 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978 and 1979 for carrying out that Act.
short_title: Board of International Broadcasting Authorization Act

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal year 1978 - Authorizes appropriations for the Board for International Broadcasting for fiscal year 1978.

titles.title: Board of International Broadcasting Authorization Act
A bill to amend the Board of International Broadcasting Act of 1973 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978 and 1979 for carrying out that Act.
